body_html:
@apaszke Thanks for the quick help! Your solution solved the problem. I have updated the code at https://gist.github.com/michaelhuang74/009e149a2002b84696731fb599408c90

However, I have another problem with the optimizer.
In FP32 mode, I can use both LBFGS and Adam as the optimizer. In the FP16/FP32 mixing mode, only Adam works.
If I use LBFGS, it has the following error:
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "neural-style-Gatys-half.py", line 194, in
optimizer.step(closure)
File "/home/mqhuang2/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/optim/lbfgs.py", line 197, in step
gtd = flat_grad.dot(d) # g * d
RuntimeError: cublas runtime error : unknown error at /home/mqhuang2/pytorch/aten/src/THC/THCBlas.cu:67
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

The error message says it is a cublas runtime error. Does this mean I simply cannot use LBFGS in FP16? Thanks.
